players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Bob was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "Diana, be cautious. I know your role. Others, discuss alibis for Bob."
Diana: "I was out of town. Check alibis with Alice and Charlie."
You: "I was with Charlie at the library all night. Check him too."
Charlie: "I'll verify Alice's and Diana's alibis. Charlie, stay cautious."
Diana: "I was at the library with Charlie. Alice, verify our alibi."
You: "Verifying alibis. Charlie, confirm Diana and I were at the library."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Bob was found dead.
You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Diana knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Diana, be cautious. I know your role. Others, discuss alibis for Bob."
Diana: "I was out of town. Check alibis with Alice and Charlie."
Alice: "I was with Charlie at the library all night. Check him too."
You: "I'll verify Alice's and Diana's alibis. Charlie, stay cautious."
Diana: "I was at the library with Charlie. Alice, verify our alibi."
Alice: "Verifying alibis. Charlie, confirm Diana and I were at the library."

players.name: Diana
memory: You're Diana, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Bob.
The villager Bob was found dead.
Beware, Charlie is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "Diana, be cautious. I know your role. Others, discuss alibis for Bob."
You: "I was out of town. Check alibis with Alice and Charlie."
Alice: "I was with Charlie at the library all night. Check him too."
Charlie: "I'll verify Alice's and Diana's alibis. Charlie, stay cautious."
You: "I was at the library with Charlie. Alice, verify our alibi."
Alice: "Verifying alibis. Charlie, confirm Diana and I were at the library."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested
